answers.answer: Maybe Trolleater will chime in. He is diabetic - and if I recall correctly treatment has actually helped his diabeteshttp://www.medhelp.org/personal_pages/user/2094297You probably know this already but anything low carb/low sugar might be the way to go. Toward the end of Incivek I would have sugar-free vanilla ice cream.Plus there is always almonds, walnuts and salmon :)If all else fails and you run out of ideas maybe you could consult with a nutritionist.Best of luck
